channel.title: Timer
channel.description:
Hi people, I was wondering if some one could help me add a pkp timer? im acurrently useing hybrid pvp source
Thanks!

item.title: Timer
item.dc:creator: @Mushy13 Mushy13
item.description:
@Mushy13 wrote:

alright since that would be really hard, would it be hard to make it so that who ever receiving 15pkp from the same person within w/e mins put it in a log of the username?

Read full topic

item.title: Timer
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Mushy13:

add a pk point timer. when you go out to wildy and receive 5pkp the same persone you just killed can come back and let you kill him again letting the persone cheating recieve 5pk every kill on the same person. via pkp farming

That would be exceedingly difficult. You would need to have an array of all the people you’ve killed in the last ‘s’ seconds.

You could however remove all PK points that were acquired illegitimately.

Read full topic
